nodes.text: In 19 BBY, a historic treaty was signed between the Galactic Empire and the Trade Federation at the end of the Clone Wars in Koto-Si, Neimoidia's capital. The Acting Viceroy Sentepeth Findos was forced to sign it at gunpoint. The treaty that stated the Trade Federation would give its assets and resources to the Galactic Empire. The Trade Federation however was allowed to continue functioning legally by the Empire under the guise of the Imperial Senate.

The treaty stipulated resources of the Trade Federation were placed under the Galactic Empire disposal. The Trade Federation was to transfer over it constituent parts to Imperial control as part of the process of imperialization and be placed under the oversight of the Imperial Senate.
The Trade Federation would however be permitted special dispensation during the distribution of assets to the Empire in light of the Federation proven track record in business.
